summary: An ordinance fixing the rate of taxes to be levied, and levying the taxes upon all taxable property, both real and personal, in the City of Seattle, in order to raise sufficient revenue to carry on the different departments and activities of the Municipal Government of the City of Seattle, and to provide for the General Lien Bond Interest and Redemption requirements for the ensuing fiscal year, to-wit: For the year beginning on the first day of January, 1952 and ending on the thirty-first day of December, 1952.
